title: Florida quarterback Grier suspended for violating NCAA rules on PEDs
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
Florida quarterback Will Grier has been suspended indefinitely for violating the NCAA's policy on banned performance-enhancing drugs. The sc...
